item.description: Photo by Tirachard Kumtanom from Pexels How do you define the success of technical documentation, and how do you measure it? item.description: How does a tech writer create value in the customer-centric era? Photo by Jessica Lynn Lewis on Pexels Still optimizing for editorial skill?
